question:
A steel manufacturer combines 98 ounces of iron with 2 ounces of carbon to make one sheet of steel. How many ounces of iron were used to manufacture \(\frac{1}{2}\) of a sheet of steel?
(A) 1
(B) 49
(C) 50
(D) 198
(E) 200
